params.markdown: The following dashboard is meant to display data for a single GPU. Use the selectors above to pick a specific GPU by UUID or Name

query.query: data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu:*
data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.utilization.gpu:*

data_stream.type : metrics and data_stream.dataset : nvidia_gpu.stats and gpu.error.xid:* and not gpu.error.xid : 0
